select employee.id, employee.account, employee.name, employee.role_id as roleId, role.name as roleName, DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),employee.registration_date) as workTime, ( select count(*) from ( select auditor_id as employee_id from loan where auditor_id = employee.id union all select grant_executor_id as employee_id from loan where grant_executor_id = employee.id union all select evaluator_id as employee_id from customer_credit where evaluator_id = employee.id ) as subQuery group by employee_id ) as num, employee.phone, employee.registration_date from employee join role on employee.role_id = role.id where 1=1
and employee.account like concat('%',#{param.account},'%')
and employee.name like concat('%',#{param.name},'%')
and employee.phone like concat('%',#{param.phone},'%')
